item.description:
it is the 11th Annual ‘Strut Your Mutt’ Dog Walkathon sponsored by the North Attleboro Animal Shelter and the Friends of North Attleboro Animal Shelter. Attendance is free and animals are welcome. There will be a DJ, raffles, contests, concessions, demonstrations and more… view link -> 

http://north-attleboro.ma.us/shelter/index.html


Date: May 21st – Rain or Shine!
Time: 10am – 3pm

Boston Snow Dogs participated last year, and it was so much
fun! We did a short demo and the folks loved it. There are
vendors, raffles, and other shows during the day. You can print
a sponsor sheet and make a donation & participate in the
walkathon which is in the high school field...right where
everything is happening.

the urban mushing demo is scheduled for 10:45

view video captured from last year http://youtu.be/LLYXvUvur_E

group.name: The South Shore Dog Lovers Pack Walk

item.name: Strut Your Mutt Event
